  • Method Details

    • setNickname

      public boolean setNickname(String nick, int user)
      nick was checked in network level
      Parameters:
      nick - != null
      user - the player's enumeration in this game
      Returns:
      true if nick is correctly set

    • isColorAvailable

      public boolean isColorAvailable(TeamEnum color)
      Check whether a given color can be assigned to another player will answer with true in case the color wasn't chosen (2 or 3 player game) if it's not grey (2 or 4 player game) or if only one player chose a particular color (4 player game)
      Parameters:
      color - the color to check
      Returns:
      true if the color is available for selection

    • setTeamColor

      public boolean setTeamColor(TeamEnum team, int user)
      Set player's team color in teamColor list in position user Each game has one color per player except the 2 player teams games that have 2 players per color. Color grey is present only in 3 players game.
      Parameters:
      team - != NoTeam
      user - the player's enumeration in this game
      Returns:
      true if team is correctly set.

    • clearTeamColor

      public void clearTeamColor(int user)
      replace team chosen by user with null
      Parameters:
      user - > 0

    • isWizardAvailable

      public boolean isWizardAvailable(int idWizard)
      Check whether a given color can be assigned to another player will answer with true in case the color wasn't chosen
      Parameters:
      idWizard - the color to check
      Returns:
      true if the wizard is available for selection

    • setWizard

      public boolean setWizard(int idWizard, int user)
      set, in user position, a new wizard id in wizards list only if there not are others equal to it
      Parameters:
      idWizard - == 0 , 10, 20 ,30
      user - the player's enumeration in this game
      Returns:
      true if wizard is set correctly

    • clearWizard

      public void clearWizard(int user)
      replace wizard chosen by user with null
      Parameters:
      user - > 0

    • allSet

      public boolean allSet()
      Returns:
      true if all users have set their parameters in order to create their players. Nickname, team color and wizard id.
